languages.text: "Быть может, шерин найдет время посетить вместе со мной Администратумский дворец? Боюсь, если мы вновь отправимся в плавание меж звезд, я уже никогда не получу свою грамоту Меркатум Табула Официале. А шерин — всех тех благ, что грамота могла бы принести протекторату фон Валанциус".

traits.locale_text: "Быть может, шерин найдет время посетить вместе со мной Администратумский дворец? Боюсь, если мы вновь отправимся в плавание меж звезд, я уже никогда не получу свою грамоту Меркатум Табула Официале. А шерин — всех тех благ, что грамота могла бы принести протекторату фон Валанциус".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Will my shereen, perhaps, find the time to visit the Administratum Palace with me? I am worried that, should we sail away on another voyage to the stars, I will never obtain my certificate, the Mercatum Tabula Officiale. And neither will my shereen savour all the benefits that said certificate could offer the von Valancius protectorate."
languages.original_text: "Быть может, шерин найдет время посетить вместе со мной Администратумский дворец? Боюсь, если мы вновь отправимся в плавание меж звезд, я уже никогда не получу свою грамоту Меркатум Табула Официале. А шерин — всех тех благ, что грамота могла бы принести протекторату фон Валанциус".

And neither will my shereen savour all the benefits that said certificate could offer to the von Valancius protectorate."

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Will my shereen, perhaps, find the time to visit the Administratum Palace with me? I am worried that, should we sail away on another voyage to the stars, I will never obtain my certificate, the Mercatum Tabula Officiale. And neither will my shereen savour all the benefits that said certificate could offer the von Valancius protectorate."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Shereen, pourriez-vous trouver le temps de vous rendre au palais de l'Administratum en ma compagnie ? Je crains que, si nous partons pour un autre voyage à travers les étoiles, je n'obtienne jamais mon accréditation, la Mercatum Tabula Officiale. Et vous ne profiteriez pas non plus de tous les avantages que cette accréditation pourrait offrir au protectorat von Valancius, Shereen. »
languages.original_text: "Will my shereen, perhaps, find the time to visit the Administratum Palace with me? I am worried that, should we sail away on another voyage to the stars, I will never obtain my certificate, the Mercatum Tabula Officiale. And neither will my shereen savour all the benefits that said certificate could offer the von Valancius protectorate."

traits.locale_text: « Shereen, pourriez-vous trouver le temps de vous rendre au palais de l'Administratum en ma compagnie ? Je crains que, si nous partons pour un autre voyage à travers les étoiles, je n'obtienne jamais mon accréditation, la Mercatum Tabula Officiale. Et vous ne profiteriez pas non plus de tous les avantages que cette accréditation pourrait offrir au protectorat von Valancius, Shereen. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “或许你有时间和我一起去一趟内政部的大厅，亲爱的？我担心的是，如果我们离开这里，去了其他行星，我可能再也没有机会得到帝国官方行商执照了。如果真的发生了这种事情，亲爱的，恐怕我就没办法为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝带来更多利益了。”
languages.original_text: "Will my shereen, perhaps, find the time to visit the Administratum Palace with me? I am worried that, should we sail away on another voyage to the stars, I will never obtain my certificate, the Mercatum Tabula Officiale. And neither will my shereen savour all the benefits that said certificate could offer the von Valancius protectorate."

traits.locale_text: “或许你有时间和我一起去一趟内政部的大厅，亲爱的？我担心的是，如果我们离开这里，去了其他行星，我可能再也没有机会得到帝国官方行商执照了。如果真的发生了这种事情，亲爱的，恐怕我就没办法为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝带来更多利益了。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「ねえシャリーン。あたしと一緒に行政院の宮殿に行く時間を作ってくれないかな？また星々への航海に出ることになったら、アタシはメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルっていう証明書を永遠に取得できないかもって思うんだ。そうなったら、証明書がフォン・ヴァランシウス保護領にもたらす恩恵を、シャリーンも享受できなくなっちゃうよ」
languages.original_text: "Will my shereen, perhaps, find the time to visit the Administratum Palace with me? I am worried that, should we sail away on another voyage to the stars, I will never obtain my certificate, the Mercatum Tabula Officiale. And neither will my shereen savour all the benefits that said certificate could offer the von Valancius protectorate."

traits.locale_text: 「ねえシャリーン。あたしと一緒に行政院の宮殿に行く時間を作ってくれないかな？また星々への航海に出ることになったら、アタシはメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルっていう証明書を永遠に取得できないかもって思うんだ。そうなったら、証明書がフォン・ヴァランシウス保護領にもたらす恩恵を、シャリーンも享受できなくなっちゃうよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Findet {mf|mein|meine} Shereen vielleicht etwas Zeit, mit mir zum Administratum-Palast zu reisen? Ich habe Angst, dass ich meine Handelslizenz, die Mercatum Tabula Officiale, nie erhalten werde, sollten wir eine weitere Reise zu den Sternen antreten. Und auch {mf|mein|meine Shereen} wird so nicht alle Vorteile auskosten können, die mit der besagten Handelslizenz für das Protektorat von Valancius einhergehen."
languages.original_text: "Will my shereen, perhaps, find the time to visit the Administratum Palace with me? I am worried that, should we sail away on another voyage to the stars, I will never obtain my certificate, the Mercatum Tabula Officiale. And neither will my shereen savour all the benefits that said certificate could offer the von Valancius protectorate."

traits.locale_text: "Findet {mf|mein|meine} Shereen vielleicht etwas Zeit, mit mir zum Administratum-Palast zu reisen? Ich habe Angst, dass ich meine Handelslizenz, die Mercatum Tabula Officiale, nie erhalten werde, sollten wir eine weitere Reise zu den Sternen antreten. Und auch {mf|mein|meine Shereen} wird so nicht alle Vorteile auskosten können, die mit der besagten Handelslizenz für das Protektorat von Valancius einhergehen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¿Quizá mi shereen dispondría de tiempo para acompañarme al palacio del Administratum? Me preocupa la posibilidad de que partamos en otra travesía rumbo a las estrellas y no tenga ocasión de obtener mi certificado, el Mercatum Tabula Officiale. Y entonces mi shereen tampoco disfrutaría de los beneficios que dicho certificado puede ofrecer al protectorado de von Valancius».
languages.original_text: "Will my shereen, perhaps, find the time to visit the Administratum Palace with me? I am worried that, should we sail away on another voyage to the stars, I will never obtain my certificate, the Mercatum Tabula Officiale. And neither will my shereen savour all the benefits that said certificate could offer the von Valancius protectorate."

traits.locale_text: «¿Quizá mi shereen dispondría de tiempo para acompañarme al palacio del Administratum? Me preocupa la posibilidad de que partamos en otra travesía rumbo a las estrellas y no tenga ocasión de obtener mi certificado, el Mercatum Tabula Officiale. Y entonces mi shereen tampoco disfrutaría de los beneficios que dicho certificado puede ofrecer al protectorado de von Valancius».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Şirinim, bir ihtimal benimle birlikte Administratum Sarayı'nı ziyaret edecek zaman bulabilir mi? Eğer yıldızlara doğru bir başka yolculuğa çıkacak olursak Mercatum Tabula Officiale tasdiknamemi asla alamayacağımdan endişeleniyorum. Bu sefer şirinim de tasdiknamenin von Valancius protektorasına sağlayacağı faydaların tadını çıkarmaktan mahrum kalır."
languages.original_text: "Will my shereen, perhaps, find the time to visit the Administratum Palace with me? I am worried that, should we sail away on another voyage to the stars, I will never obtain my certificate, the Mercatum Tabula Officiale. And neither will my shereen savour all the benefits that said certificate could offer the von Valancius protectorate."

traits.locale_text: "Şirinim bir ihtimal benimle birlikte Administratum Sarayı'nı ziyaret edecek zaman bulabilir mi? Eğer yıldızlara doğru bir diğer yolculuğa çıkacak olursak sertifikamı, Mercatum Tabula Officiale'yi asla elde edemeyeceğimden endişeleniyorum. Şirinim de bu sertifikanın von Valancius protektorasına sağlayacağı faydaların tadını çıkarmaktan mahrum kalır."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
